title: Is Kendrick Lamar gay & Out? - Quora

response.answer_text: Don't know if he's gay but hes def the worst rapper i ever heard most of his rhymes dont even rhyme at all and like I read other people say his words also make no sense obvously hes not the brightest man I have nothing against the man just don't understand how so many people praise this man like hes the best rapper of all time which to me is a disrespect to rappers that like biggie and especially tupac whom hes been compared to and some people even say hes a poetic rapper like tupac which I would think has him turning in his grave he was a genious and he made sense and rhymed at the same time night and day difference only songs that aren't terrible that I've heard of his are when he sings using autotune its even catchy sometimes but his lyrics when he tries to rhyme are the worst ive yet to hear it shows that nowerdays anyone can blow up in the rap game u don't even need talent anymore which is sad
